drink.ruleB: Clint is squinting (extra drink if it's into the sunset).
drink.ruleD: For each scene of a vast desert or mountain range.
drink.ruleE: There's a horribly out of place ricochet sound.

gulp.ruleA: Clint speaks with a cigar in his mouth (once per scene).
gulp.ruleB: Clint fires a revolver by using the hammer instead of the trigger.
gulp.ruleC: Someone falls through or smashes through something.

chug.ruleA: Clint is drinking liquor straight from the bottle.
chug.ruleC: Clint says a famous line (Ex. "Do you feel lucky?").
